articles.title: This robot doesn't need any electronics: Walking quadruped is controlled and powered by pressurized air - Science Daily
articles.description: Engineers have created a four-legged soft robot that doesn't need any electronics to work. The robot only needs a constant source of pressurized air for all its functions, including its controls and locomotion systems.
articles.content: Engineers at the University of California San Diego have created a four-legged soft robot that doesn't need any electronics to work. The robot only needs a constant source of pressurized air for all … [+4559 chars]
